scripts.dev: npx prisma generate && DATABASE_URL='file:dev.sqlite' npx prisma db push --accept-data-loss && DATABASE_URL='file:dev.sqlite' npx vite-node ./server.ts --watch -- --schema prisma/generated/prisma-appsync/schema.gql --watchers '[{"watch":["**/*.prisma","*.prisma"],"exec":"npx prisma generate && DATABASE_URL='file:dev.sqlite' npx prisma db push --accept-data-loss && touch ./server.ts"}]'
scripts.deploy: npx cdk synth && npx cdk bootstrap && npx cdk deploy
